name: Fly By Night
description:
Brave the night skies!

Guide your prop plane to the end of each course and dodge any obstacles along the way. This game is only controlled with the left and right mouse buttons. Left click will raise and lower your plane, and right click will allow you to perform a barrel roll. Barrel rolls will allow you to pass through obstacles unharmed, and you'll receive bonus points for doing so. The more obstacles you avoid in a single barrel roll, the bigger the reward. See how high of a score you can attain!

Developer's note: I originally designed this game while going through the Unity Learn Junior Programmer pathway a few weeks ago. Part of the coursework has you developing a personal project, but I was disappointed when I discovered that they didn't actually expect you to ever finish it. I was fairly happy with the game I had been working on, so I decided to finish it up, polish it a little, and release it on my itch.io page. It took about 2 weeks of on-and-off work to get this to a state where I was happy enough with the game to release it. It's still a little odd in some spots, but I hope you enjoy!
